entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is mentioned as speaking scornfully in the text.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as wishing he hadn't spoken and trying to deflect a conversation.

entities.name: fleur
entities.description: Fleur is mentioned as an alternative to Tonks in the family.

entities.name: tonks
entities.description: Tonks is mentioned as someone Ginny would rather have in the family and Ron's cousin.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as making a comment about Tonks looking like Moaning Myrtle.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as defending Tonks and saying she hasn't gotten over what happened.

entities.name: moaning myrtle
entities.description: Moaning Myrtle is mentioned as someone Ron compares Tonks to.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is mentioned as a cousin of Tonks and the reason for Harry's heart sinking.

entities.name: phlegm
entities.description: Phlegm is mentioned as an alternative name to Fleur.

relationships.description: Ginny prefers Tonks in the family.
Ron compares Tonks to Moaning Myrtle.
Hermione defends Tonks saying she hasn't gotten over what happened.
